title: Starting a Blog in 2026 ?. Am I trippin'?
metaTitle: Starting a Personal Tech Blog in 2026: Regaining Creativity in the AI Era
metaDescription: Discover why starting a personal tech blog in 2026 is worth it. Explore regaining creativity in the AI-driven world, sharing learning journeys, and writing your own voice in a sea of AI-generated content.
content:
So here is the deal. I know if you have lived in the world of internet you probably heard a million times by now :

" Blogging is dead ! "

"Who even writes by himself in the post LLMS era ?"

Well, here is my perspective.

Over the whole 2025 , I decided multiple times to start writing something but everytime got distracted by something like lack of motivation , semester work load , feeling it being not worth the effort. Lately I have noticed that I am loosing my sense of creativity and something i would say " a personal taste" due to extensive usage of LLMs for writing . It sounds bad but reality is that these LLMS have destroyed that the integrity of online platforms like X (Twitter), Reddit,Linked etc. Whenever you open one of these platforms you see the same patterns of AI generated bloat by people . I really imagine a world which is close that we will end up having a bunch of bots writing and bunch of bots commenting on bots . This is scary. A part of this is happening today.

So 2026 has come by . One of my new year resolutions is to start this blog not to get an audience but to regain my sense of creative writing that has eroded over the past couple of years due to LLMS. I am not sure the specific topics I will be touching upon but most of them will be about my learning journey in the tech space and i will try to explain some cool concepts as it will help me myself get indepth understanding of the topic .

So I am not sure whether my words will have a "human reader" or not but I have realized after years of just observing the whole internet space for almost decade now the time has come that I should have my own voice and throw some words in the infinite abyss of cosmic reality may be a stranger will come by to ponder upon my thoughts . So if "You" are that stranger. I really appreciate your presence here and stay tuned for some interesting stuff.

see you soon again .
